summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to David Rodgers, commanding him to appear and testify on July 22, 2019, and to produce documents. It relates to an investigation into alleged violations of federal sex trafficking and conspiracy statutes.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Issued the grand jury subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: David Rodgers
persons.context: The individual commanded to appear before the grand jury to testify and produce documents related to the investigation.

connections.description: Berman, as U.S. Attorney, is issuing a legal command (subpoena) to Rodgers to compel his testimony and document production before the grand jury.

events.title: Scheduled Grand Jury Appearance of David Rodgers
events.description: David Rodgers is commanded to appear before the federal grand jury in the Southern District of New York to testify and produce documents.

events.title: Issuance of Grand Jury Subpoena
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office issues a grand jury subpoena to David Rodgers as part of an official criminal investigation.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Manhattan, New York, New York
The Silvio J. Mollo Building, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The subpoena is part of an official criminal investigation into suspected felonies, specifically alleged violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 1591 (sex trafficking), 2421, 2422, 2423 (various Mann Act violations), and 371 (conspiracy).
The U.S. Attorney's Office requested the recipient, David Rodgers, to voluntarily refrain from disclosing the subpoena's existence to preserve the investigation's confidentiality.
The document includes an 'Advice of Rights' section informing the recipient of their right against self-incrimination and right to counsel.
The subpoena was issued on July 6, 2019, with the appearance scheduled for July 22, 2019, indicating an active federal investigation at that time.
